meanings.definition: The state of being sick or ill due to motion sickness while traveling by air.
meanings.sent1: The airsickness affected him as soon as the plane took off.
meanings.sent2: She always carries ginger candies to combat airsickness during flights.
meanings.sent3: His airsickness was so severe that he couldn't even look out the window.
meanings.sent4: The airsickness subsided once the plane leveled off at cruising altitude.
meanings.sent5: The airsickness hit her suddenly, causing her to pale and feel queasy.
